*Infectra nodded and looked around* Infectra: What should I expect to happe=
n or find out here? *Infectra says to The Radicons*
  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July =
06, 2000 4:49 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Give them a chance, I'm=
 sure they'll like you." Airbomber whispered back to Infectra...
    ----- =
Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


    *Infectra smiles waves to any bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I d=
on't think they like me. *Infectra whispers to Airbomber*
      ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
 Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
=


      "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobody was aimin=
g their blaster's at Infectra.

      "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She=
's with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa growled.

      "These Radicons fire=
d at me, Artist, and Dracona when we tried to help them and ran away! I don=
't think they could be trusted!" Plintissa said.

      "We have our gestal=
t form and we're useful and powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away=
 angrily...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: iloveallliz=
ards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 =
7:12 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Infectra nods and fo=
llows the Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted?=
 *Infectra says to the Radicons*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
        From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tu=
esday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
          Subject: Neo Beast Wars


          =
Sinesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when t=
he other looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each=
 other, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

       =
   Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they walked off to th=
e Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

          "Hey, have any of you =
seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa asked. Dracona started to =
look around in logical places a lunatic might hide.

          Deemos and I=
nzola got bored of sitting around and drinking tea and they left again.

  =
        "Who shall we join with, dear?" Inzola asked.

          "Whomever =
wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on until they see the Alli=
ance base.

          "This one looks good, lets go and ask them if they ha=
ve any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked up to the base.
=

          "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join your fine team, we h=
ave been looking for a faction to join, and it appears that it is you who w=
ill obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join you, what fo we ha=
ve to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, please, no killing =
a bot things or anything.)

          Gangon had a nightmare, He was again =
tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Sinesis came up to him. Then Br=
ightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pulled of their masks and were 2 =
headed, one head Inzola, and the other head Deemos. Gangon screamed and hel=
d hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remembered that he couldn't move. =
He considered that thing about getting a replacement body, how it would be =
a good idea just in case he had to get out of this dump, which was probable=
 if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona to come =
back.

          The Radicons looked at Infectra.

          "Now, all you =
need to do is follow us, we have set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sur=
e they won't mind, seeing as how you would make a great addition to their g=
roup." Airbomber said. They walked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for =
Infectra to follow.

          Artist walked around the war room in circles=
, not quite knowing where he was going.
